    • getNextBot

      public BigBot getNextBot() throws EmptyCollectionException
      method used to get the current bot that is going to move. logic is remove the first bot in the queue, put it back into the end of the queue and return it.
      Returns:
      currentBot meaning, the next bot to move.
      Throws:
      EmptyCollectionException - if the list of bots is empty

    • getCurrentBotIndex

      public int getCurrentBotIndex() throws EmptyCollectionException
      return the index of the bot that last moved ( in the back of the list of bots )
      Returns:
      returns index of the bot in the back of the unorderedList!
      Throws:
      EmptyCollectionException - if the list of bots is empty
